#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits.h>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

char s[100004];

int mini(int a, int b)
{
    if(a <= b)
    return a;
    else
    return b;
}
int maxi(int a, int b)
{
    if(a >= b)
    return a;
    else
    return b;
}

int main()
{
    int t,len,i,j,k,f = 0;
    int min = INT_MAX;
    int r,g,b;
    int count = 0;
    int ans;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        r = -1;
        g = -1;
        b = -1;
        ans = INT_MAX;
        count = 0;
        scanf("%s",s);
        len = strlen(s);
        for(i = 0; i < len; i++)
        {
            if(s[i] == 'R')
            r = i;
            else if(s[i] == 'G')
            g = i;
            else
            b = i;

            if(r != -1 && g != -1 && b != -1)
            {
                count = maxi(r,maxi(g,b)) - mini(r,mini(g,b)) + 1;
                ans = mini(ans,count);
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
